item.title: jemeter基本使用
item.description: 一：参考 [jemeter] https://jmeter.apache.org/ 二：概要 三：jemeter使用 3.1 启动 1）配置 jemeter/bin/setenv.bat set JVM_ARGS=-Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -Dpropname=value 2)启动方式 jmeter.bat run JMeter (in GUI mode by default) jmeterw.cmd run JMeter without the windows shell console (in GUI mode by default) jmeter-n.cmd drop a JMX file on this to run a CLI mode test jmeter-n-r.cmd drop a JMX file on this to run a CLI mode test remotely jmeter-t.cmd drop a JMX file on this to load it in GUI mode jmeter-server.
